title: Ship bundled background music MP3 as static asset for production-safe playback

requirements.summary: Commit the provided MP3 into frontend/public so existing getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3') background-music code can load it in production without hotlinking.
acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3 exists in the repo and is included in the production build output under the correct base path.

In a production deployment, after the user has accepted the intro overlay and performs a user interaction to unmute, background music plays audibly and loops (no 404s for the MP3 in the browser Network tab).
The app does not attempt to load background music from the external URL at runtime; it loads only via getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3').
When navigating away/closing the tab/unmounting the app, the background music stops (no continuing audio playback).

file_operations.description: Download the MP3 from https://image2url.com/r2/default/audio/1770895970075-efc8efc8-d8ca-4014-a506-846ed3573d6b.mp3 and commit it at this exact path so getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3') resolves base-path safely in production and does not rely on the external URL at runtime.

Verify background music continues to load exclusively via getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3') (no external URL fallback) and that teardown reliably stops audio on unmount/pagehide/beforeunload to prevent continued playback.
